definitions.definition: Any person or thing that brings stability .

subdefinitions.definition: Any substance added to something in order to stabilize it, as for example a fuel additive that prolongs the shelf life of petrol.
An additional wheel on a bicycle to keep it upright to assist a learner .
A gyroscopically controlled fin or similar device that prevents the excess rolling of a ship in rough seas.
An airfoil that stabilizes the flight of an aircraft or missile .
A piece of backing fabric used in embroidery .

definitions.definition: For a group operating on a set and an element x of the set, the set of all group elements fixing x .

main_definition: Any person or thing that brings stability .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) For a group operating on a set and an element x of the set, the set of all group elements fixing x .
